name: codsen-monorepo
description: Monorepo of all our npm libraries
author: Roy Revelt <roy@codsen.com>

scripts.build: FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna run test --bail --concurrency 1 && npm run readme:generate
scripts.fresh: npm run wipe && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.publish: FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna version --conventional-commits --yes && lernacleanchangelog '**' && npm run readme:generate && git add packages && git commit -m "chore: Automated build tasks" --no-verify && npm run republish
scripts.test: FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna run test && npm run readme:generate && npm run info
scripts.test:full: FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna run test --stream --concurrency 1 && npm run readme:generate && npm run info
scripts.test:only: FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna run unittest --stream --concurrency 1 && npm run readme:generate && npm run info
scripts.wipe: rm -rf node_modules && FORCE_COLOR=1 npx lerna clean -y

hooks.pre-commit: lerna run test --since --concurrency 2 && git add packages/*/dist/*.*
